about_the_game:
Missed out on DOOM Eternal’s Event Four - Hack to the Future? Grab over 12 cosmetic items, including all the character and weapon skins, custom animations, and player icons and nameplates. Fight the hordes of Hell in style in DOOM Eternal’s epic campaign and BATTLEMODE, or show off your player and weapons skins in the campaign’s Photo Mode.

You get:
  • "Retro" Revenant Master Collection
    Includes:
    • "Fiend" Skin Variant
    • "Ghoul" Skin Variant
    • Upgradeable "Classic" Podium
    • New Revenant podium animations

  • "Demoncide" Slayer Skin
  • "Nightfire" Marauder Skin
  • "Blue Flame" Archvile Skin
  • "Circuit Board Chaingun" Skin
  • "Maykr Combat Shotgun" Skin
  • "Still Good" Icon
  • "Ghostpepper" Icon
  • "Sprite Master" Icon
  • "Retro Revenant" Nameplate
  • "Pixel Warrior" Nameplate
  • "Pixel Master" Nameplate
  • and more!

*This content requires the base game DOOM Eternal to play.

content_descriptors.notes: Similar to DOOM from 2016, DOOM Eternal will contain Blood and Gore, Intense Violence and Strong Language

detailed_description:
Missed out on DOOM Eternal’s Event Four - Hack to the Future? Grab over 12 cosmetic items, including all the character and weapon skins, custom animations, and player icons and nameplates. Fight the hordes of Hell in style in DOOM Eternal’s epic campaign and BATTLEMODE, or show off your player and weapons skins in the campaign’s Photo Mode.

You get:
  • "Retro" Revenant Master Collection
    Includes:
    • "Fiend" Skin Variant
    • "Ghoul" Skin Variant
    • Upgradeable "Classic" Podium
    • New Revenant podium animations

  • "Demoncide" Slayer Skin
  • "Nightfire" Marauder Skin
  • "Blue Flame" Archvile Skin
  • "Circuit Board Chaingun" Skin
  • "Maykr Combat Shotgun" Skin
  • "Still Good" Icon
  • "Ghostpepper" Icon
  • "Sprite Master" Icon
  • "Retro Revenant" Nameplate
  • "Pixel Warrior" Nameplate

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: DOOM Eternal: Series Four Cosmetic Pack - $8.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy DOOM Eternal: Series Four Cosmetic Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 / 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Ryzen 3 @ 3.1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti (4GB), GTX 1060 (3GB), GTX 1650 (4GB) or AMD Radeon R9 280(3GB), AMD Radeon R9 290 (4GB), RX 470 (4GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: ( 1080p / 60 FPS / Low Quality Settings )
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or better, or AMD Ryzen 7 1800X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB), NVIDIA GeForce 970 (4GB), AMD RX 480 (8GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: ( 1080p / 60 FPS / High Quality Settings ) - *On NVIDIA GTX 970 cards Texture Quality should be set to Medium

oflc.descriptors: High impact violence, Blood and Gore, Online interactivity

short_description: Missed out on DOOM Eternal’s Series Four event - Hack to the Future? Grab over 12 cosmetic items, including all the character and weapon skins, custom animations, and player icons and nameplates.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese, Polish*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
